MainPage.p1: Our project is a light-weight versions of Postman and GraphQL combined in one app.
MainPage.p2: Postman is an API platform for building and using APIs. Postman simplifies each step of the API lifecycle and streamlines collaboration so you can create better APIsâ€”faster.
MainPage.p3: GraphQL is a playground/IDE for graphQL requests. GraphQL provides a complete and understandable description of the data in your API, gives clients the power to ask for exactly what they need and nothing more, makes it easier to evolve APIs over time, and enables powerful developer tools.
MainPage.p4: Overall, our project provides you a solution that makes interacting with GraphQL and Postman easier and more efficient. You can experiment with various endpoints, input queries, manage variables and headers, and then enjoy the results of your efforts. We believe this will be a useful addition to any project.
MainPage.p5: This project was created as part of the course RS School.React Course
MainPage.p6: RS School is a free and community-based online education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes Community since 2013. Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence. However, you should have sufficient base knowledge before the program begins.Currently 500+ developers from different countries and companies involve in the education process as mentors.
